title: The Sorcerer's Legacy
description: Book 3 of the Sorcerer's Path: Azerick has found himself a home and tries to settle down. He takes on an apprentice and tries to put all the death and desire for vengeance behind him. But when the Rook finds him, Azerick is once again pulled back into Ulric's schemes. Azerick decides to put an end to it, once and for all.
author: Brock E. Deskins
